pkgmetadata.longdescription: Automated Git Commit Messages using the 'OpenAI' 'GPT' Model // Automates the process of adding, committing, and pushing changes to a 'git' repository using commit messages generated by passing the git diff output to the 'OpenAI' 'GPT-3.5 Turbo' model (https://platform.openai.com/docs/models/gpt-3).
